name: Install root CA on macOS
description: Creates a root CA with openssl

steps.name: Check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Verify the certificate exists. It generates if not on disk.

data.command: if [ -f #{cert_filename} ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

steps.name: Resolve dependency 1/1
steps.description: Verify the certificate exists. It generates if not on disk.

data.command:
if [ ! -f #{key_filename} ]; then openssl genrsa -out #{key_filename} 4096; fi;
openssl req -x509 -new -nodes -key #{key_filename} -sha256 -days 365 -subj "/C=US/ST=Denial/L=Springfield/O=Dis/CN=www.example.com" -out #{cert_filename}

steps.name: Re-check dependency 1/1
steps.description: Verify the certificate exists. It generates if not on disk.

data.command: if [ -f #{cert_filename} ]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;

input_arguments.name: key_filename
input_arguments.description: Key we create that is used to create the CA certificate
